New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers extend their win streak to 12
Key Match Events: Jarrett Allen dove into the courtside seats to rebound Barnes' missed turnaround
Darius Garland followed with a 3-pointer that extended the Cavaliers' lead to 129-124
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Kenny Atkinson said wrapping up a back-to-back set against the Raptors was “a perfect trap game”
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland's players didn't take the message to heart until the final quarter, when they outscored Toronto 34-23
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland has the top home mark in the NBA, going 20-1 at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse
Toronto is a league-worst 1-17 on the road and has lost 15 of its last 16 overall
Others: Donovan Mitchell was given the night off after playing a team-high 35 minutes Wednesday in a 129-122 win over the Thunder
